newsitem.title: UK: Petronas sets three bonds for total $1.5 bln.
newsitem.headline: Petronas sets three bonds for total $1.5 bln.

text.p: Petroliam Nasional (Petronas) has launched three bonds for a total of $1.5 billion, joint lead managers CS First Boston and Salomon Brothers said.
Tranche one is a $600 million five-year bond, which will be priced to yield 38 to 40 basis points over U.S. Treasury notes.
Tranche two is a $600 million 10-year bond, which will be priced to yield 57 to 59 b.p. over.
Tranche three is a $300 million 30-year bond which will be priced at around 85 b.p. over U.S. Treasuries.
Pricing is expected by 1400 GMT on Thursday.
